amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 116-395 to allow the Secretary of Agriculture or the Secretary of the Interior, as appropriate, to exclude from wilderness designations under this Act any areas that do not meet the definition of wilderness in the Wilderness Act.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to allow the Secretary of Agriculture or the Secretary of the Interior, as appropriate, to exclude from wilderness designations under this Act any areas that do not meet the definition of wilderness in the Wilderness Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 236 (Roll no. 62).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. McClintock.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 236 (Roll no. 62).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
